entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:29 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
